content: The Centipede Guai can be found in a massive pit full of skulls called the Bonevault. To reach the Bonevault, head to the Middle Hollow Keeper's Shrine in the Webbed Hollow. Drop down the wooden platform beside the Shrine and head straight forward to drop into the pit of bones.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Centipede Guai can be found in a massive pit full of skulls called the Bonevault. To reach the Bonevault, head to the Middle Hollow Keeper's Shrine in the Webbed Hollow. Drop down the wooden platform beside the Shrine and head straight forward to drop into the pit of bones.
